message.content: {"given_definition_quality":50,"better_definition":"to return to (a place); to go back","sentence":"我回到家。","image_prompt":"In a soft apocalypse animation style, depict a person standing at the entrance of a simple house, opening the door as if arriving home. The environment looks slightly desolate or surreal, with gentle post-apocalyptic colors and textures. The focus is on the feeling of returning home, with a peaceful, hopeful mood despite the surroundings.","sentence_translation":"I return home."}
